metadata.Title: CVE-2013-4142 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: ** REJECT **  DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER.  ConsultIDs: CVE-2013-3969.  Reason: This candidate is a duplicate of CVE-2013-3969.  Notes: All CVE users should reference CVE-2013-3969 instead of this candidate.  All references and descriptions in this candidate have been removed to prevent accidental usage.

criterions.comment: mongodb: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
